entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. High 25 except 19 near Lake Erie.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then a few showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60. High 25 except 19 near Lake Erie. Humidex 28. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 before morning. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 5 in the afternoon. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 70 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to plus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
